page.title: 08RECREATION.TOWN PARK
page.content: The{Town Park}is{180 hectares.}It is divided into 3 parts, which are 1. {amusement,}2.{peaceful areas and lakes and 3.{field study areas.}The park is used for enjoyment. The main proposed change is to have a{leisure}park. Many people go to the{Town Park}to walk, cycle, fish, play, birdwatch, picnic, relax and to watch shows in the Amphitheatre. The{Town Park}has been there for about 16 years. At the moment the{Telford Development {Corporation }is plannng to build houses on the{Town Park.}Because of this{H.O.O.P}(hands off our park) has been formed . Also{H.O.O.P}is campain- ing against the plan to privatize part of the{Town Park}so that you have to pay to go into it. This part of the {Town Park}will be called the{Theme {Park.
